Speaking 💬️

What I've spoken about at conferences, Meetups, hackathons, etc.

HR DevFest - November 2015

I’ve given talks on a variety of topics.

If you’d like me to speak at an event, don’t hesitate to reach out!

Presentations

All my presentations can be found on my SlideShare .

Burn Prevention ↗️

Presented to parents and children during an Operation Smile medical mission in Vietnam.

Coding Bootcamps ↗️

A brief history of how coding bootcamps came to be and where they're headed.

Hour of Code ↗️

Volunteered to teach kids of all levels why coding is cool and how to get started.

So You Want to Be A Wizard ↗️

What it's like to be a developer and how you can get started.

TypeScript 101 ↗️

A brief class that introduces the benefits TypeScript provides to large scale projects.

VA ACM Club ↗️

An overview of the Virginia ACM club and the Slack channel trying to unite the local clubs.

Web Design ↗️

Presented to parents and children during an Operation Smile medical mission in Vietnam.

iMovie 101 ↗️

Presented the basics of video editing using iMovie to Operation Smile mission trainees.
